overview: Louis Theroux spends time with ex-Conservative MP Neil Hamilton and his wife Christine, a couple whose names have rarely been absent from media headlines in recent years.  While Louis is in their company, newspaper and TV interest intensifies with accusations of a serious sexual assault, from which the Hamiltons were later cleared. With the press camped out of the couple's doorstep, Louis gains an insight into living in the full glare of the media spotlight.
title: When Louis Met... The Hamiltons
